column3: Greetings, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>. If you have any <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/> or <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(2),2,1)/>, I should be glad to offer you <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(3),2,1)/> and <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(4),2,1)/> respectively in exchange.
Select the scrip you wish to exchange.
Warning: You will not be able to receive all <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/>. Do you still wish to proceed?
Oh? You don't appear to have any <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/>...
Oh? It seems you already possess the maximum number of <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(1),2,1)/> permitted...
